message.name: PopUp Maneuver
message.description: The Pop Up maneuver makes the vehicle come to the surface at a specific waypoint. This maneuver is restricted to underwater vehicles.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run. If the maneuver is not completed in the amount of time specified an error will be generated.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Duration
field.description: The duration of this maneuver at surface level. Only used if flag WAIT_AT_SURFACE is on.

field.name: Radius
field.description: Radius of the maneuver. Only used if flag STATION_KEEP is on.

value.name: Start from current position
value.description: If this flag is set, lat/lon/start_z fields should be ignored and current vehicle position should be considered as starting point for ascent/descent.

value.name: Wait at surface
value.description: If this flag is set, duration field is used to hold position at surface for that amount of time.

value.name: Station keeping
value.description: This flag will only make sense if WAIT_AT_SURFACE is also set. While holding position at surface the vehicle will assume a station keeping behavior.

message.name: Teleoperation Maneuver
message.description: The Teleoperation Maneuver lets the vehicle be controlled by an external human operator.

message.name: Loiter Maneuver
message.description: The Loiter maneuver makes the vehicle circle around a specific waypoint with fixed depth reference.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The timeout indicates the time that an error should occur if exceeded.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Duration
field.description: The duration of this maneuver. Use '0' for unlimited duration time.

message.name: Rows Maneuver
message.description: Rows maneuver (i.e: lawn mower type maneuver)

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

message.name: Follow Path Maneuver
message.description: Maneuver constituted by a list of Path Points.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Path Points
field.description: List of PathPoint messages, encoding the path points.

message.name: Path Point
message.description: Waypoint coordinate of a Follow Path maneuver.

field.name: North Offset (m)
field.description: The North offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the path start point.

field.name: East Offset (m)
field.description: The East offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the path start point.

field.name: Down Offset (m)
field.description: The Down offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the path start point.

message.name: Yo-Yo Maneuver
message.description: A "yo-yo" is a maneuver specifying a vehicle movement to a target waypoint in which depth/altitude varies along the way between two values with a desired pitch angle.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Pitch Angle
field.description: Pitch angle for use in ascent/descent.

message.name: Teleoperation Done
message.description: Notification of completion of a Teleoperation maneuver.

message.name: Elevator Maneuver
message.description: The Elevator maneuver specifies a vehicle to reach a target waypoint using a cruise altitude/depth and then ascend or descend to another target altitude/depth. The ascent/descent slope and radius can also be optionally specified.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run. If the maneuver is not completed in the amount of time specified an error will be generated.

value.name: Start from current position
value.description: If this flag is set, lat/lon/start_z fields should be ignored and current vehicle position should be considered as starting point for ascent/descent.

field.name: Start Point -- Z Reference
field.description: Altitude or depth of start point. This parameter will be ignored if the 'NO_Z' flag is set, or if the 'START' flag is not set.

field.name: Start Point -- Z Units
field.description: Units of the start point's z reference.

field.name: End Point -- Z Reference
field.description: Depth or altitude for the end point. This parameter will be ignored if the 'NO_Z' flag is set.

field.name: End Point -- Z Units
field.description: Units of the end point's z reference.

field.name: Radius
field.description: Radius for use in ascent/descent. If 0 the controller to should use a custom control strategy.

message.name: Follow Trajectory
message.description: Maneuver constituted by a list of Trajectory Points.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

message.name: Trajectory Point
message.description: Waypoint coordinate of a Follow Trajectory maneuver.

field.name: North Offset (m)
field.description: The North offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the trajectory start point.

field.name: East Offset (m)
field.description: The East offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the trajectory start point.

field.name: Down Offset (m)
field.description: The Down offset of the North/East/Down coordinate of this point in relation to the trajectory start point.

field.name: Time Offset (s)
field.description: The time offset relative to the previous trajectory point.

message.name: Custom Maneuver
message.description: The Custom Maneuver message may be used as specification of a very specific maneuver not covered by the IMC scope. The settings of the maneuver are just its id, timeout and other settings encoded as a tuple list.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run. If the maneuver is not completed in the amount of time specified an error will be generated.

field.name: Maneuver Name
field.description: The maneuver name, used as key by an implementation to bind the maneuver to the corresponding controller.

message.name: Polygon Vertex
message.description: This message is used to store the various polygon vertices for CoverArea maneuvers.

message.name: Compass Calibration Maneuver
message.description: This maneuver is a mix between the Loiter maneuver and the YoYo maneuver. The vehicle cirlcles around a specific waypoint with a variable Z reference between a minimum and maximum value.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The timeout indicates the time that an error should occur if exceeded.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

field.name: Pitch
field.description: Pitch angle used to perform the maneuver.

field.name: Duration
field.description: The duration of this maneuver. Use '0' for unlimited duration time.

message.name: Follow Reference Maneuver
message.description: This maneuver follows a reference given by an external entity.

field.name: Controlling Source
field.description: The IMC identifier of the source system that is allowed to provide references to this maneuver. If the value ''0xFFFF'' is used, any system is allowed to command references.

field.name: Controlling Entity
field.description: The entity identifier of the entity that is allowed to provide references to this maneuver. If the value ''0xFF'' is used, any entity is allowed to command references.

field.name: Reference Update Timeout
field.description: The ammount of time, in seconds, after which the maneuver will be terminated if no reference has been received. In other words, the controlling entity should send reference updates in shorter periods than 'timeout'.

field.name: Loiter Radius
field.description: Whenever an intended reference is achieved, this maneuver will maintain the vehicle in vaticiny of that location. The loiter radius is used to define the radius of this (xy) area.

field.name: Altitude Interval
field.description: Similarly to Loiter Radius, this field is used to define the "z" distance considered to be inside the vacitiny of the target location. An AUV may, for instance, be floating until it more than z units above the current reference, in which case it actively changes its position in order to achieve the desired depth / altitude.

value.name: Use this Reference as Start Position for PathControler
Use Current Position as Start Position for PathControler

field.name: Controlling Source
field.description: The IMC identifier of the source system that is allowed to control the vehicle. If the value ''0xFFFF'' is used, any system is allowed to command references.

field.name: Controlling Entity
field.description: The entity identifier of the entity that is allowed to control the vehicle. If the value ''0xFF'' is used, any entity is allowed to command references.

value.name: Loitering after arriving at the reference
Hovering after arriving at the reference
Moving in z after arriving at the target cylinder

message.name: Dislodge Maneuver
message.description:
A "Dislodge" is a maneuver ordering the vehicle to attempt a series of thruster operations that will hopefully get it unstuck from an entangled condition.
Parameters are RPMs for the motor when attempting dislodge and and a flag specifying whether the thrust burst should be attempted forward, backward or auto (letting the vehicle decide).

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Direction
field.description: Direction to which the vehicle should attempt to unstuck.

message.name: Launch Maneuver
message.description:
A "Launch" is a maneuver specifying a movement of the vehicle to a target waypoint after being launched from a ship or pier. The waypoint is described by the WGS-84 waypoint coordinate and target Z reference.
Mandatory parameters defined for a "Launch" are timeout, speed and speed units.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Target reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.

message.name: Alignment Maneuver
message.description:
An "Alignment" is a maneuver specifying a movement of the vehicle to a target waypoint intended to control activation of an IMU/INS in order to start aligning navigation for more precise dead reckoning operation.
Mandatory parameters defined for a "Launch" are timeout, speed and speed units.

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

message.name: Follow Command Maneuver
message.description: This maneuver follows a direct command given by an external entity.

field.name: Controlling Source
field.description: The IMC identifier of the source system that is allowed to provide command to this maneuver. If the value ''0xFFFF'' is used, any system is allowed to command references.

field.name: Controlling Entity
field.description: The entity identifier of the entity that is allowed to provide commands to this maneuver. If the value ''0xFF'' is used, any entity is allowed to command references.

field.name: Reference Update Timeout
field.description: The ammount of time, in seconds, after which the maneuver will be terminated if no new command has been received. In other words, the controlling entity should send command updates in shorter periods than 'timeout'.

message.name: Command To Follow
message.description: This message must be sent by an external entity to provide command references to a system running a "Follow Command Maneuver". If no Command messages are transmitted, the system will terminate maneuver.

value.name: Use Speed Reference in meters per second
value.description: Command system to move at speed reference provided in "speed" field in meters per second.

value.name: Use Speed Reference in revolutions per minute
value.description: Command system to move at speed reference provided in "speed" field in revolutions per minute.

value.name: Use Z Reference as depth
value.description: Command system to move at z reference provided in "z" field in depth.

value.name: Use Z Reference as altitude
value.description: Command system to move at z reference provided in "z" field in altitude.

value.name: Use Heading Reference
value.description: Command system to move at a heading reference provided in "heading" field in radians.

value.name: Use Heading Rate Reference
value.description: Command system to move at a heading rate reference provided in "heading" field in radians/s.

value.name: Flag Maneuver Completion
value.description: Command system to exit maneuver's execution.

field.name: Speed Reference
field.description: The value of the desired speed, in the scale specified by the "flags" field.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: The value of the desired z reference in meters.

field.name: Heading Reference
field.description: The value of the desired heading angle, relative to true north, in radians, or, the value of the desired heading rate angle, in radians.

field.name: Controlling Source
field.description: The IMC identifier of the source system that is allowed to control the vehicle. If the value ''0xFFFF'' is used, any system is allowed to command references.

field.name: Controlling Entity
field.description: The entity identifier of the entity that is allowed to control the vehicle. If the value ''0xFF'' is used, any entity is allowed to command references.

value.name: Waiting for first command
value.description: System is waiting for first command.

value.name: Moving towards received command
value.description: System is moving according with command provided.

value.name: Speed command is zero
value.description: System is stopped. Speed reference is zero.

value.name: Command is out of safe bounds
value.description: Command provided breaks system's physical limitations.

value.name: Controlling system timed out
value.description: Maneuver will be terminated since timeout was exceeded.

message.name: Magnetometer Maneuver
message.description: Magnetometer calibration maneuver (i.e: one square pattern in one direction, a second square in the opposite direction)

field.name: Timeout
field.description: The amount of time the maneuver is allowed to run.

field.name: Z Reference
field.description: Maneuver reference in the z axis. Use z_units to specify whether z represents depth, altitude or other.
